<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/newbooks/2019/07/11/14-26-%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D1%8E%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BC%D0%BE%D1%8F-%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%BF%D1%8A%D1%82%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D0%BA%D1%8A%D0%BC-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%88%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/yugoslavia-cover.jpg" alt="Излиза "Югославия, моя страна" - едно пътуване към прошката">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/newbooks/2019/07/11/14-26-%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D1%8E%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BC%D0%BE%D1%8F-%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%BF%D1%8A%D1%82%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D0%BA%D1%8A%D0%BC-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%88%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0.html">Излиза "Югославия, моя страна" - едно пътуване към прошката</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Авторът Горан Войнович е словенски режисьор, сценарист, колумнист, поет и писател. <!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/bookreviews/2019/07/03/10-58-%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%BC%D1%8A%D1%85-%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%8F%D0%B5-%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%85%D1%8F%D0%BB%D0%BC%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BD-%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BE%D1%82-19-%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BA-%D0%B2-%D1%81%D1%8E%D1%80%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B5%D1%82.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/siviyatmahsiyae.jpg" alt="Рецензия: "Сивият мъх сияе", Тор Вилхялмсон - Исландия от 19 век в сюрреалистично видение на поет">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/bookreviews/2019/07/03/10-58-%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%BC%D1%8A%D1%85-%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%8F%D0%B5-%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%85%D1%8F%D0%BB%D0%BC%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BD-%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BE%D1%82-19-%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BA-%D0%B2-%D1%81%D1%8E%D1%80%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B5%D1%82.html">Рецензия: "Сивият мъх сияе", Тор Вилхялмсон - Исландия от 19 век в сюрреалистично видение на поет</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Природата в този роман е навсякъде. <!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/interviews/2019/07/01/09-41-%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD-%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B2-%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%BF%D1%83%D0%BB%D1%81-%D0%B5-%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%B1%D1%8A%D0%B4%D0%B8-%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%B8.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/ivanlandzhev.jpg" alt="Иван Ланджев: Творческият импулс е точно обратното на самодоволството "бъди себе си"">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/interviews/2019/07/01/09-41-%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD-%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B2-%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%BF%D1%83%D0%BB%D1%81-%D0%B5-%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%B1%D1%8A%D0%B4%D0%B8-%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%B8.html">Иван Ланджев: Творческият импулс е точно обратното на самодоволството "бъди себе си"</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Според мен е ключово всичкият опит, който трупаш, все пак да успява да те запази глупав, наивен, любопитен – готов да грешиш отново и отново. Само така можеш да правиш...</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                                                <a href="/category/interviews">Интервюта</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                1                        Юли                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->
